attributes.action: tax the cars of migrant workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more and more migrant workers are living in this country. they are having a positive effect on our economy but there is a growing trend to bring their own cars with them and under current laws they dont seem to need to pay road tax.  the proposal is to make any  foreign cars liable for roax tax if they remain in this country for longer than one month.  this would ensure that we ALL pay for using the roads

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
